commit_scope: Remove default gpt-5.3->gpt-5 alias fallback and trigger codex model fallback only after model-not-found/access failures, with retry override evidence in task context.
evidence_refs: Before fix hosted failure: task_2696dc22b2a4b0a7 returned model access error for gpt-5.3-codex without remapping to gpt-5-codex
Hosted post-fix verification: task_5aafefb7c722370a completed with model openclaw/gpt-5.3-codex and output OAUTH_FIX_OK
Hosted typo alias verification: task_64fda47091fcf552 completed with command --model gpt-5.3-codex and output TYPO_OK

local push hook refreshed maintainability_audit_report.json and was recorded in this evidence update

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting CI completion and branch merge to main.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Runner keeps gpt-5.3 model by default and only applies fallback to gpt-5-codex when model-not-found/access errors are detected.
test_flows: Submit gpt-5.3-codex task and verify command model remains gpt-5.3-codex
On model-not-found/access failure, schedule retry with retry_override_command mapped to fallback model
